suggestedTasks.title: Add Unit Tests for Agent Selection UI Component
suggestedTasks.description: Create comprehensive unit tests for the new agent selection dropdown in the spawn UI. Verify dropdown behavior, default selection logic, and override functionality. Tests should cover edge cases like initial load, routing rule interactions, and user selections.
suggestedTasks.reason: Ensure robust test coverage for new UI interaction logic

suggestedTasks.title: Document Agent Selection UI Interaction Pattern
suggestedTasks.description: Update developer documentation to explain the new agent selection pattern in the spawn UI. Include details on how routing rules interact with manual overrides, and the expected user experience for selecting agents and models.
suggestedTasks.reason: Improve team understanding of new UI feature

patterns: Use dropdown with routing rule awareness
gotchas: Ensure default selection logic is transparent
